ticket.description:
We require a HTML Email Gallery to showcase our emails to clients.
Work Required: - Domain name - Hosting - Design & Development of Site - Resourcing Email Templates
Aiming to have this ready for our next monthly Jericho Newsletter.

ticket.description:
Hi,
I am just wondering if we can change the time to AU time. I have set-up this account as an AU account. Did I miss out anything?
Account: Aemy Tester The time should be 4:22 p.m.

Assembla ticket created 2824 : Jericho DC - Can we change NZ time in SMP to AUS time?

on 2013-04-05 06:35 * By Samuel Hannah Status changed from New to In Progress SmartMail Pro only displays in NZST. The User Preference option is not functioning as intended. I will talk with the team about an approach to this.
